product_name: Mountaineers Books The Northern Forest Canoe Trail Guidebook
long_description: The Northern Forest Canoe Trail Guidebook covers the 740 miles of waterways that link New York, Vermont, Quebec, New Hampshire and Maine, offering detailed paddle route information and more.
short_description: The Northern Forest Canoe Trail Guidebook covers the 740 miles of waterways that link New York, Vermont, Quebec, New Hampshire and Maine, offering detailed paddle route information and more.
